short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Take a screenshot, markup and annotate it. Easy share, anywhere
short.de: Machen Sie einen Screenshot, kommentieren Sie ihn und senden Sie ihn direkt aus Google Mail
short.es: Tome una captura de pantalla, anótela y envíela directamente desde Gmail
short.fr: Prenez une capture d'écran, annotez-la et envoyez-la directement depuis Gmail
short.it: Fai uno screenshot, annotalo e invialo direttamente da Gmail
short.ja: スクリーンショットを撮り、注釈を付けて、Gmailから直接送信します
short.nl: Maak een screenshot, maak er aantekeningen bij en verzend deze rechtstreeks vanuit Gmail
short.pl: Zrób zrzut ekranu, dodaj do niego adnotacje i wyślij go bezpośrednio z Gmaila
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: Faça uma captura de tela, anote e envie diretamente do Gmail
short.zh_CN: 截取屏幕截图，添加注释，然后直接从 Gmail 发送

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
This is a lightweight Chrome extension that will let you screenshot anything you see on your screen, so you can do any of the following on your screen capture:

☑︎  Write text
☑︎  Crop
☑︎  Use arrows
☑︎  Pixelate sensitive information 
☑︎  Include rectangular boxes or lines
☑︎  Get a link of your marked up image to send to anyone!
☑︎  Share and collaborate on screenshots
☑︎  Full Gmail email message and email conversation screenshots 
☑︎  Forward email messages or email conversations as screenshots 
☑︎  Save screenshots to Google Drive, Dropbox, Box
☑︎  Save screenshots as PDF

This is an excellent communication tool for any graphic designers, remote teams, project leaders, and more! 

cloudHQ. Helping your productivity, 1 click at a time.

Website: https://www.screenshot-tool.com/
cloudHQ website: https://www.cloudhq.net
Pricing: FREE
Support page: https://support.cloudhq.net/category/browser-extensions/gmail-screenshot/
Blog: https://blog.cloudhq.net


Gmail, Google Calendar, and  Google Workspace are trademarks of Google LLC. Use of these trademarks is subject to Google Permissions.
